job_tasks.phrase: You can build web applications autonomously from scratch.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the ability to develop web applications, which is a core component of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: As a Full Stack Engineer, you will join a multi-disciplinary team where you will have end-to-end responsibility for your solutions.
job_tasks.justification: Being a Full Stack Engineer and having end-to-end responsibility implies building and managing the entire software solution.

job_tasks.phrase: learn how processes and systems work.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a need to understand the existing business processes and systems to effectively integrate solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Build, test, deploy and run high quality and highly scalable Gen AI solutions.
job_tasks.justification: The core of the role involves building and deploying Gen AI solutions, which implies working with and implementing generative AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: test, deploy and run high quality and highly scalable Gen AI solutions.
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'deploy and run' signifies operational aspects of managing AI solutions in production.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to the relentless automation of the above activities.
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to automating operational tasks, a key aspect of MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Convert these generic parts to re-usable building blocks used by 1000+ tech teams.
job_tasks.justification: Creating reusable components and building blocks is a fundamental software development practice.

soft_skills.phrase: Work within a squad to learn how processes and systems work.
Pair-program with other team members to solve critical or complex problems.
Receive help from peers, experts, and stakeholders so we can improve together.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building and running 'Gen AI solutions,' including end-to-end responsibility for these solutions and the automation of their deployment and operation. While it mentions web application development, the core focus is on generative AI.
